attributes.action: Make phone companies reveal unknown caller IDs to stop nuisance calls in UK.
attributes.additional_details: Ban or stop the use of 141. 1470 or #31#. There is no need for someone or businesses to hide numbers if they are legit and genuine.
attributes.background:
This will stop scammers and immature people causing unnecessary stress.
I have had many people call my house phone with death threats exposing my home address without knowing who these people are. Revealing numbers can and will deter nuisance calls.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/263072
